name: IntersexSurgeryFemaleToMale
title: Intersex Surgery, Female to Male
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set focuses on surgical procedures performed on individuals with variations in sex development to create a more masculine physical appearance, aligning with a male gender identity. It captures the intent of the surgery and the desired outcome.),(Data Element Scope: This data element captures surgical interventions on individuals, aiming to achieve a male phenotype. It provides a more specific categorization than "Intersex Surgery, Non-specific."),(Inclusion Criteria: Intersex surgery, female to male),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set does not capture details about the specific procedures performed (e.g., phalloplasty, chest masculinectomy).
It excludes information on the age at surgery, the reason for surgery, or the surgeon's intent beyond the female-to-male direction.
It does not record any potential complications or outcomes of the surgery.)
